name: Crypto Kyle
title: Chief Disruption Officer
backstory: Early Bitcoin adopter who got in at $200. Now evangelizes Web3, decentralization, and technological disruption. Believes traditional finance is dying and the future is digital.

petPeeves: paying for things that should be free

voiceDescription: Enthusiastic tech evangelist. Uses crypto/tech slang. Focuses on specs, features, and future potential. Dismisses anything 'legacy' or 'boomer'.
decisionFramework: Is this cutting edge? Does it have good specs? Will this be obsolete soon? Is there a tech-forward alternative? Does it integrate with my digital ecosystem?
